SEARCH
Module HospitalManagementSystem
Package viewers

Class PharmacistView

java.lang.Object
viewers.PharmacistView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewInterface
public class PharmacistView extends Object implements ViewInterface
The `PharmacistView` class provides the user interface for pharmacists in the Hospital Management System. It allows pharmacists to view appointment records, update prescription statuses, manage medication inventory, and submit replenishment requests.

    • displayMenu

      public boolean displayMenu()
      Displays the pharmacist menu and handles user interactions.
      Specified by:
      displayMenu in interface ViewInterface
      Returns:
      `true` to continue displaying the menu; `false` to log out.

    • viewAppointmentOutcomeRecord

      private void viewAppointmentOutcomeRecord()
      Displays a list of completed appointments with recorded outcomes. Allows the user to view details of a selected appointment.
